General.Name: Akbar Indomakmur Stimec Tbk
General.Description: PT Akbar Indo Makmur Stimec Tbk engages in the coal mining and trading business in Indonesia. The company was founded in 1957 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Akbar Indo Makmur Stimec Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Aims Indo Investama.
General.Address: Jalan Cipaku I No. 3 Petogogan, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12170
